positive.review: Its great for updating drivers if your lazy which I am but still it works great
i don't use it so much for updating drivers, because this thing is really good at cleaning up old USB data for things no longer plugged in. for that it's great
My goto Driver update software, Use it after every windows update. Can't live without it

Игра Driver Booster for Steam - отличный инструмент для тех, кто хочет поддерживать свои драйверы в актуальном состоянии без лишних хлопот. Она сканирует систему и быстро выявляет устаревшие или отсутствующие драйверы, предлагая решения для их обновления всего в один клик. Интерфейс простой и понятный, даже для новичков.

Я особенно ценю функцию резервного копирования драйверов, которая позволяет восстановить старые версии в случае возникновения проблем с новыми. Это добавляет уверенности во время процесса обновления.

Однако, стоит отметить, что в бесплатной версии есть некоторые ограничения по скорости загрузки драйверов. Платная версия снимает эти ограничения и открывает дополнительные функции, такие как автоматическое обновление в фоновом режиме. В целом, Driver Booster for Steam значительно упрощает процесс поддержания системы в оптимальном состоянии и помогает избежать проблем с несовместимостью драйверов, особенно в играх. Рекомендую!
One time it deleted the bluetooth capability of my mac running windows via bootcamp but all experiences with this program using the pro version for windows 11 has been great!
Love it all! It does exactly what is asked of it and I have zero complaints!
Please get this game its so fun to play all day every day.
Good software to keep driver update
great product to keep drivers up to date
Got my drivers updated very easily.
MY GOD I CAN ACTUALLY PLAY GAMES LIKE HD2 AT 30FPS WITHOUT LAG I THANK YOU

Outdated or missing drivers are a common cause of slow PC performance. Keeping track of your computer's drivers can be challenging, so using a tool like IObit Driver Booster is helpful. This software automatically detects outdated or missing drivers, allowing you to update them or download new ones with ease. Additionally, the Game Booster feature optimizes performance during gameplay.

My goto Driver update software, Use it after every windows update. Can't live without it
Not really a “game,” but it’s handy for keeping stuff running smooth. Does what it says.
its been a solid, user friendly, straight forward experience.

an easy way to dowload , backup, and fix driver mistakes geniunly helped me a lot especially at the fixing part

This is THE BEST application for driver installation, i have tried them all from DOS times until today and DRIVER BOOSTER has saved my $20K  monster computer which i love, also saved my job fixing impossible driver problems with a Lenovo ThinkPad monster Laptop belonging to the CEO, basically saved the company. Thank you very much.

Titlu: Rapid, Simplu, dar Controversat – Driver Booster

★★★★☆ Recomand (cu atenție)

Driver Booster este genul de aplicație care îți promite liniște sufletească: „dă-mi două click-uri și îți țin eu toate driverele în viață”. Și, sincer, pentru majoritatea utilizatorilor obișnuiți, chiar își face treaba bine. Actualizează driverele rapid, curat și fără să stai tu cu capul în Device Manager. Dar, ca orice tool „automat”, vine cu plusuri și minusuri importante.

Atmosferă & Interfață

UI-ul este modern, curat și ușor de folosit. Totul e la vedere: scanare mare în centru, lista de drivere dedesubt, opțiuni simple. Nu te pierde în meniuri inutile și nu cere cunoștințe tehnice — genul de soft pe care îl înțelegi în 30 de secunde.

Funcționalitate

Driver Booster scanează PC-ul pentru drivere vechi sau lipsă și le actualizează cu versiuni găsite în baza lui de date. Procesul durează puțin, iar instalarea e automatizată.
E super util mai ales după reinstalare de Windows sau pentru PC-uri mai vechi unde nu vrei să cauți manual tot ce mișcă.

În plus, include mici tool-uri extra: fix pentru sunet, internet, GPU, periferice etc. Nimic miraculos, dar utile când ești în pană și vrei o soluție rapidă.

Puncte Forte

Super ușor de folosit, perfect pentru începători.

Scanare rapidă și instalare cu un click.

Rezolvă destul de bine driverele lipsă după instalarea Windows-ului.

Interfață modernă, prietenoasă.

Tool-uri extra pentru probleme comune.

Puncte Slabe

Ca orice soft de drivere automatizat, poate instala versiuni nepotrivite în cazuri rare.

Varianta gratuită e limitată și încearcă uneori să te împingă spre PRO.

Unele „optimizări” sunt doar marketing, nu rezolvă nimic real.

Pentru utilizatori avansați, manual = mai sigur în 100% din cazuri.

Concluzie

Driver Booster este un tool excelent pentru cei care vor simplitate și nu au chef să caute drivere individual. Funcționează bine pentru majoritatea situațiilor și îți poate salva timp serios.

Dar — mare dar — trebuie folosit cu cap. Dacă ai un PC high-end, hardware sensibil sau vrei control total, actualizările manuale din site-ul oficial al producătorului sunt întotdeauna varianta „profi”.

Pentru utilizatorul obișnuit însă?
E un aliat bun, rapid și comod.

[b] tl;dr it depends, works for some, and for others it doesn't [/b]

I do recommend this, but with important caveats: This is a useful tool but you have to use it responsibly (meaning driver backups, creating system restore points, and in the worst case knowing how to restore an OS that doesn't boot) because on an older PC it can end up replacing older working drivers with newer drivers that don't work with the older hardware. 

"Newer" doesn't always equate to "better" and sometimes, the old cliche "If it ain't broke, don't fix it" applies. Not understanding the caveats are where many of the negative reviews come from. People who don't know end up with a crap shoot somewhere between "It fixed it!" to "It broke it!". If you aren't yet ready for the caveats I've pointed out, I'd say outright avoid this. That said, it is helpful if you understand how to use it and if you're careful of the potential caveats.

This message brought to you by the Society for the Prevention Of Cruelty to Kernels (SPOCK).

Captain, if you found this highly logical, please mark it helpful to increase its visibility and save the poor souls who might otherwise end up with an unbootable OS. Remember: Friends don't let friends update drivers irresponsibly.
boosts slightly but good for rust gaming
its great you don't waste time looking for updates
i mean, it sure did update my drivers so... its fine
Please get this game its so fun to play all day every day.
Good software to keep driver update
great product to keep drivers up to date
Got my drivers updated very easily.

[b]There’s not much to say about this app — it just works, and it works perfectly.[/b]

I’ve never had any problems with it, and I’m confident I never will. No more headaches after formatting your PC, trying to hunt down old or outdated drivers on shady, virus-filled websites.

I’ve been using this program for many years, since around 2003, and while I did have issues in the past with losing my license when buying directly from their website, on Steam that never happens. [b]Kudos to Steam and kudos to IObit[/b] for making our lives easier.

This program is worth its full price, but it often goes on sale too — a great bonus.

Honestly, [i]anyone complaining probably has a potato PC or simply doesn’t know how to use it[/i], which is almost impossible given how intuitive the UI is. It’s literally: click, download, and watch the magic happen.

[b]Highly recommended.[/b]

negative.review: Completely bricked my ASUS ROG Gaming laptop. SSD became inaccessible ("INACCESSIBLE_BOOT_DEVICE") after drive booster executed an auto-reboot during driver installation. You get what you pay for, or worse.

do recommend this, but with important caveats: This is a useful tool but you have to use it responsibly (meaning driver backups, creating system restore points, and in the worst case knowing how to restore an OS that doesn't boot) because on an older PC it can end up replacing older working drivers with newer drivers that don't work with the older hardware.

"Newer" doesn't always equate to "better" and sometimes, the old cliche "If it ain't broke, don't fix it" applies. Not understanding the caveats are where many of the negative reviews come from. The worst software on Steam I have ever used! It messed up my drivers so badly some of my apps don't even start. I also got malware from it, and got an BYOVD attack. Moreover, it installed strange software in my Program Files, they were flagged by my antivirus software and was the cause of the problem. Now, because of this app II have to reinstall Windows because it also messed up EVEN my kernel files and my SECURITY POLICIES! I don't recommend this app at all! Stay away from it!

Awful (free? my arse it is) product.
Yes it'll scan your PC and let you know what's out of date, BUT that's just about it.
IF you actually WANT to do anything.. each button leads you to a buy product page.
It's just an advertising piece of software to get you to buy their products and the desktop pop-ups are fkn ridiculous when you have this running in the background.
DO NOT bother installing this waste of memory piece of trash software.

Rating: ★★★☆☆ (Recommended with caution)

My experience with the "Driver Booster for Steam" program has been useful but not perfect.

What I liked a lot was how easy it is to use. Having the program directly within Steam makes the process of scanning and updating drivers extremely easy and saves me the hassle of searching for them manually. It solves a real problem for the average user.

However, what I disliked was that the program constantly tried to direct me towards the paid (Pro) version. The advertisements and prompts for the paid version appeared frequently, which spoiled the simple, hassle-free experience I was looking for.

I recommend others to try it with caution: If you want a quick solution and don't mind some in-app advertisements, it will be useful for you. But if you prefer an experience completely free of annoyances, this program may not be the best choice.
stay away, you cant even turn it off!!!!
0.5/10 could never get it to run
Não sei exatamente pra que serve
it fucked my mouse drivers
pay to scam?

Installed it, ran it, rebooted ... and found that my whole system had been borked. It screwed up my SSD driver, so that I fell into a recursive loop. I had to get someone to create a USB repair stick and roll back to an earlier System Restore point. First time using it, and it causes a catastrophic failure. I will not ever install this junk again, and I recommend you don't, either.

Avoid using this garbage! It installs shady, custom-made drivers of unknown origin, which can cause your PC to lag or crash. Always download drivers only from the official websites of your hardware manufacturers!
Unfortunately, after the driver upgrade, the laptop's touchpad stopped working. It seems that this software is still not specialized enough to find and install the correct versions.

do recommend this, but with important caveats: This is a useful tool but you have to use it responsibly (meaning driver backups, creating system restore points, and in the worst case knowing how to restore an OS that doesn't boot) because on an older PC it can end up replacing older working drivers with newer drivers that don't work with the older hardware.

"Newer" doesn't always equate to "better" and sometimes, the old cliche "If it ain't broke, don't fix it" applies. Not understanding the caveats are where many of the negative reviews come from. People who don't know end up with a crap shoot somewhere between "It fixed it!" to "It broke it!". If you aren't yet ready for the caveats I've pointed out, I'd say outright avoid this. That said, it is helpful if you understand how to use it and if you're careful of the potential caveats.

The worst software on Steam I have ever used! It messed up my drivers so badly some of my apps don't even start. I also got malware from it, and got an BYOVD attack. Moreover, it installed strange software in my Program Files, they were flagged by my antivirus software and was the cause of the problem. Now, because of this app II have to reinstall Windows because it also messed up EVEN my kernel files and my SECURITY POLICIES! I don't recommend this app at all! Stay away from it!

Trying to update drivers with this causes my system to black screen every time.  Luckily enough my pc is still fine, but reading other reviews will tell you this is not an uncommon problem and some had to completely reset their pc because it screwed it up that bad.  Because this is supposed to make your pc run better and quite literally the opposite has been happening, I cannot recommend this product.
used it to update my drivers, and it disabled my 3.5mm jack and i cant make it work again. dont bother with it.

I had to get someone to create a USB repair stick and roll back to an earlier System Restore point. First time using it, and it causes a catastrophic failure. I will not ever install this junk again, and I recommend you don't, either.

Avoid using this garbage! It installs shady, custom-made drivers of unknown origin, which can cause your PC to lag or crash. Always download drivers only from the official websites of your hardware manufacturers!
Unfortunately, after the driver upgrade, the laptop's touchpad stopped working. It seems that this software is still not specialized enough to find and install the correct versions.

do recommend this, but with important caveats: This is a useful tool but you have to use it responsibly (meaning driver backups, creating system restore points, and in the worst case knowing how to restore an OS that doesn't boot) because on an older PC it can end up replacing older working drivers with newer drivers that don't work with the older hardware.

"Newer" doesn't always equate to "better" and sometimes, the old cliche "If it ain't broke, don't fix it" applies. Not understanding the caveats are where many of the negative reviews come from. People who don't know end up with a crap shoot somewhere between "It fixed it!" to "It broke it!". If you aren't yet ready for the caveats I've pointed out, I'd say outright avoid this. That said, it is helpful if you understand how to use it and if you're careful of the potential caveats.

This message brought to you by the Society for the Prevention Of Cruelty to Kernels (SPOCK).

Captain, if you found this highly logical, please mark it helpful to increase its visibility and save the poor souls who might otherwise end up with an unbootable OS. Remember: Friends don't let friends update drivers irresponsibly.

Completely bricked my ASUS ROG Gaming laptop. SSD became inaccessible ("INACCESSIBLE_BOOT_DEVICE") after drive booster executed an auto-reboot during driver installation. You get what you pay for, or worse.

The worst software on Steam I have ever used! It messed up my drivers so badly some of my apps don't even start. I also got malware from it, and got an BYOVD attack. Moreover, it installed strange software in my Program Files, they were flagged by my antivirus software and was the cause of the problem. Now, because of this app II have to reinstall Windows because it also messed up EVEN my kernel files and my SECURITY POLICIES! I don't recommend this app at all! Stay away from it!

Trying to update drivers with this causes my system to black screen every time. Because this is supposed to make your pc run better and quite literally the opposite has been happening, I cannot recommend this product.
used it to update my drivers, and it disabled my 3.5mm jack and i cant make it work again. dont bother with it.
